page.title: 15RECREATION IN HOLMER GREEN
page.content: There are many recreational facilities in this area and sports play a major part in leisure activities.Around this area there are many sports clubs which offer a wide range of choice,including tennis,cricket,football,squash,golf, badminton,netball and rugby.There is a Derby and Joan club for the elderly and Brownies,Cubs,Beavers,Scouts and Guides for the young.There is a Women's Institute and a Flower Arranging club too.There is a Youth Club in the village open twice a week for 13 to 18 year olds.The activities available to them are snooker,darts,poole,space invaders,listening to music and occasionally local pop groups hold concerts there.There are no public swimming pools but both private swimming pools and tennis courts are owned by a few residents.The Secondary School also offers evening classes.
